metadata.title: Hanna - Official Rock Band Website
metadata.description: Official website of Hanna rock band. News, concerts, music and merch. Available in English, Ukrainian and Polish.
metadata.keywords: rock band, Hanna, music, concerts, Ukraine, Poland, tour dates

Concerts.noConcerts: There are no scheduled concerts at the moment.

About.title: About
About.descriptionOne: Hi there! Let's introduce ourselves. We are Hanna, a Polish - Ukrainian  band  founded by singer-songwriter and  composer Hanna Tiekucheva.
About.descriptionSecond: Musicians of two nations are united here.  Melancholic melodies, ethnic  motifs, and electronic sounds are blended in our music and this all is  emphasized by a solid dose of presto guitars, powerful vocals and lyrics that flow from the depths of our souls.
About.descriptionThird: With our works we want to  convey a beautiful story of darkness, happiness, love, respect framed in a romantic and unique Eastern European atmosphere, no one will remain  indifferent.
